An '''instrument''' consists of a sound with its corresponding range and use duration. They are currently only used for [[goat horn]]s.

== Definition ==

Instruments can be defined in [[data pack]]s, as part of the directory structure below.

{{Data pack directory|instrument|<nowiki><name>.json</nowiki>}}

== JSON Format ==
Instruments are defined using the following format:
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound}} The root object.<section begin="json format" />
** {{nbt|compound|description}}: A [[text component]] that is used as a description in tooltips.
** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|sound_event}}: {{json_ref|sound event|inline=1}}
*** {{nbt inherit/sound event}}
** {{nbt|float|use_duration}}: A non-negative float for how long the use duration is.
** {{nbt|float|range}}: A non-negative float for the range of the sound.<section end="json format" />
</div>
